cause.description:
Housing has always been a serious issue for the Washingtonians. Hundreds and thousands are dying without proper shelter over their head. Washington DC Housing Fund sponsored by Maxxum Realtors & Associates, Inc. is working towards raising the benchmark and aiding towards housing for the ones in need.
There are many shelters and group homes for the disabled and the homeless but there are more people on the streets.
Help for a great cause to elevate the society by helping others.
1. Give shelter receive peace
cause.mission: Leading the TRI state in developing housing for the ones in need
cause.name: Washington DC Housing Fund
